scripts.build:github: cross-env GITHUB_PAGES=true vite build && cross-env GITHUB_PAGES=true node scripts/fix-github-pages-paths.mjs && cross-env GITHUB_PAGES=true node scripts/seo-setup.mjs
scripts.lighthouse:open: npm run build && lhci autorun --config=./lighthouserc.cjs && open ./lighthouse-results/index.html
scripts.accessibility:test: npm run build && (cd dist && python3 ../scripts/spa-server.py 8080 &) && sleep 5 && node scripts/accessibility-test-robust.mjs; pkill -f 'spa-server.py' || true
scripts.accessibility:test:github: npm run build:github && (cd dist && python3 ../scripts/spa-server.py 8080 &) && sleep 5 && GITHUB_PAGES_TEST=true node scripts/accessibility-test-robust.mjs; pkill -f 'spa-server.py' || true
scripts.accessibility:report: npm run build && (cd dist && python3 ../scripts/spa-server.py 8080 &) && sleep 5 && node scripts/accessibility-report.mjs; pkill -f 'spa-server.py' || true
scripts.accessibility:html: npm run build && (cd dist && python3 ../scripts/spa-server.py 8080 &) && sleep 5 && node scripts/accessibility-html-report.mjs; pkill -f 'spa-server.py' || true
scripts.accessibility:ci: npm run build && (cd dist && python3 ../scripts/spa-server.py 8080 &) && sleep 5 && node scripts/accessibility-test-robust.mjs; pkill -f 'spa-server.py' || true
